org.joty.workstation.gui

Class RadioTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joty.data.WrappedField
      • org.joty.workstation.data.WField
        • org.joty.workstation.gui.Term
          • org.joty.workstation.gui.RadioTerm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MasterRadioTerm

    public class RadioTerm
extends Term
    It is a container for a RadioButton instance.

    The m_master member holds a reference to the Term instance that manages the RadioButton having the role of data holder.

    See Also:
    RadioButton, MasterRadioTerm

    • Field Detail

      • m_isActor

        public boolean m_isActor
        Set by TermContainerPanel.setRadioAsActor method this member holds the ability of the term to manage the enabling state or to clear the value of the set of components managed by Term instances that result to be dependent on this instance.
        See Also:
        Term.m_dependenceDirectness, TermContainerPanel.setDependence(java.lang.String), RadioButton
